column4: hi.i have installed realplayer 11 in intrepid but everytime i try to play a .rmvb movie in it it crashes anyone has any ideas
try running it from a terminal and see if there are any error messages
open a terminal, applications, accessories, terminal.. then run the player from there
the player opens the problem happens when i open a .rmvb file wih the player it just closes
how do you start the player?
where is "realplay" located? you can check using "which realplay"
just type "which realplay" without the quotes in the terminal, "which" is a command
ok.. what happens if you just start the realplayer from the terminal, just type "realplay" in the terminal
then do the thing that crashes it and take a look in the terminal.. do you get any text there? errors?
don't paste stuff here, use the pastebin

(realplay.bin:3268): Pango-CRITICAL **: pango_layout_set_text: assertion `layout != NULL' failed  (realplay.bin:3268): Pango-CRITICAL **: pango_layout_get_pixel_extents: assertion `PANGO_IS_LAYOUT (layout)' failed Opening ALSA PCM device default /usr/bin/realplay: line 57:  3268 Floating point exception$HELIX_LIBS/realplay.bin "$@"
ok, see that last line, "floating point exception".. that means something went very wrong with the program and it had to shut down
not a lot you can do about that.. wait for the realplayer people to release a new version
